thread.title: South Carolina sees sun, but flooding ordeal far from over
thread.title_full: South Carolina sees sun, but flooding ordeal far from over

title: South Carolina sees sun, but flooding ordeal far from over
text:
> Pennsylvania South Carolina sees sun, but flooding ordeal far from over Water pours from a gate in the Lake Murray dam in Columbia, S.C., Tuesday, Oct. 6, 2015. Despite an improving forecast, it will still take weeks for the state to return to normal after being pummeled by a historic rainstorm. (AP Photo/Chuck Burton)
